summary: WHEN TRAVELING TO ANY DESTINATION UTILIZING CITY STREET OR A HIGHWAY, WHETHER TRAFFIC IS HEAVY OR MOVING FAST OR SLOW, MY VEHICLE IS ALWAYS BEING CUT IN FRONT OF , CUT OFF  WITH INTENT. CAUSING ME TO APPLY BRAKES WHETHER I AM TRAVELING AT 35 MPH , 45, 55, 60, 70, EVEN IN A SCHOOL ZONE AT 15 MPH.   ALSO,  I HAVE CONCERNS ABOUT THE DRIVER SEAT,
